name: June Foray
notable_works: Rocky the Flying Squirrel. Natasha Fatale and Nell Fenwick, Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas! (TV special)
spouse: Bernard Barondess, (1941–1953; divorced), Hobart Donovan, (1955–1976; his death)
awards: '''Daytime Emmy Awards''', 2012 Outstanding Performer in an Animated Program, ''The Garfield Show'' '''Annie Awards''', 1996 and 1997 Outstanding Individual Achievement for Voice Acting by a Female Performer in an Animated Television Production, ''Sylvester and Tweety Mysteries''
